decision_conditions: The development permitted shall be begun before the expiration of three years from the date of this permission.  REASON:	In order to comply with the provisions of the Town and Country Planning Act 1990 (as amended). | The development hereby permitted shall be carried out in accordance with the following approved plans: 11285/03, 04 and 05 received on 23/01/2012.  REASON: For the avoidance of doubt and in the interests of proper planning. | All external materials to be used in the development shall match the appearance of those of the existing building.  REASON:	To ensure that the materials harmonise with the surroundings, in accordance with policies 4.1, 4.8 and 5.5 of the Adopted Ealing Unitary Development Plan, 'Plan for the Environment'(2004) and policies 7.4, 7.6 and 7.8 of the London Plan (2011). | Notwithstanding any indication in the drawings submitted with this application, detailed design of the proposed front door shall be submitted to and approved in writing by the Local Planning Authority before any works commence on site, the plans should be to scale 1:20, technical specifications, material and supplier's details will also be included in these details.  REASON: To safeguard the special architectural or historic interest and the visual amenities of the building and the Ealing Common Conservation Area, in accordance with policies 4.1 and 4.8 of the adopted Ealing Unitary Development Plan, 'Plan for the Environment' (2004) and policies 7.4, 7.6 and 7.8 of the London Plan (2011) | No part of the roof of the single storey rear extension shall be used as or altered to form a balcony, roof garden, roof terrace or similar amenity area.  REASON:  To protect the living conditions of occupants of nearby properties, in accordance with policies 4.1, 5.5 and 5.9 of the Adopted Ealing Unitary Development Plan, 'Plan for the Environment'(2004) and policies 7.4 and 7.6 of the London Plan (2011).
description: Single storey rear extension (following demolition of existing part rear conservatory extension), and installation of replacement door to front elevation
